lore: The Magi of the Refuge wanted to create a creature that could grant simple wishes to aid them with mundane tasks and in their investigations.\n\nSome Djinn Dreamweavers hide in their lamp near trade routes until an unsuspecting merchant confuses it with a valuable object due to its golden color. At night, the creature comes out and modifies its target's dreams day after day, introducing ideas and desires until it turns the victim into a slave.
menagerieDialog: Make a wish. The only rule is that you can't wish for more wishes.
The most powerful weapon is deceit. You'd do well to remember that.
I don't trust Everett. I think it's because his haircut is terrible.
Make a wish, then blow out the fire on my head.
Your creatures would be nothing without my support. You're welcome.
name: Djinn Dreamweaver
